item.title: Connect Jupyter to Remote
item.description: Here’s how to connect to a remote Jupyter notebook. Create an ssh tunnel to your remote machine: ssh -L 8080:localhost:8080 user@12.34.56.78 Start Jupyter on that machine in headless mode: jupyter notebook --no-browser --port=8080 Use a browser to open one of the urls that Jupyter presents: http://localhost:8080/?token=xyz
